dc_description_s: The following report outlines the workflow used to optimize your Find Hot Spots result:Initial Data Assessment.There were 3777 valid input features.There were 9 outlier locations; these were not used to compute the polygon cell size.Incident AggregationThe polygon cell size was 7096.0000 Meters.The aggregation process resulted in 536 weighted areas.Incident Count Properties:Min1.0000Max118.0000Mean7.0466Std. Dev.12.5919Scale of AnalysisThe optimal fixed distance band selected was based on peak clustering found at 55950.4284 Meters.Hot Spot AnalysisThere are 30 output features statistically significant based on a FDR correction for multiple testing and spatial dependence.OutputRed output features represent hot spots where high incident counts cluster.Blue output features represent cold spots where low incident counts cluster.
dc_title_s: Hot Spots2 Insured Sorted Infrastructure: Ohio
